oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Finance Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Chairman R.C. Shasteen and members of the Finance Subcommittee met nine times between February and April 1980. The subcommittee discussed the Department of Finance and fiscal provisions under consolidation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Finance--Tennessee; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
